New Records: The New York Yankees clinched their 32nd consecutive winning season with a 2-0 victory over the Chicago Cubs
Key Match Events: The game was a turning point as the Yankees secured their season-long winning streak with a dominant performance
Post-Match Reflections: Yankees manager Aaron Boone praised the team's resilience after the victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Wrigley Field in front of 40,080 fans
Others: The game marked the second straight win for the Yankees over the Cubs
